# gitlab-v1alpha1_gitlab_instance (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `metadata` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))
- `spec` (Attributes) spec defines the desired state of GitlabInstance (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--spec))

### Optional

- `alarms` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms))
- `api_version` (String)
- `deviations` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--deviations))
- `kind` (String)
- `name` (String) name of the GitlabInstance
- `namespace` (String) the namespace scope in which to operate
- `status` (Attributes) status defines the observed state of GitlabInstance (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--status))

### Nested Schema for `spec`

Optional:

- `api_base_url` (String) Base URL for the Gitlab API.

<a id="nestedatt--spec--auth_secret_ref"></a>
### Nested Schema for `spec.auth_secret_ref`

Optional:

- `key` (String) Key of the secret
- `name` (String) Name of the secret
